name: Allen's Tale
description:
Made during the Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1 with the theme: "It is not real"


Allen's Tale

Welcome to Allen's Tale, a horror game that takes place in 1 room, where your goal is to survive until someone comes and finds you.

How to play

Click the white buttons to interact with objects or read dialogue.

Click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or E to skip dialogue.

HOW TO SUCCEED

Window: Close it by pressing the white button

Door: Close it by pressing the white button

Bed: Play music through the vinyl player

Playing music, or keeping the door closed increases your anxiety.

You lose if your anxiety is too high too long, or if you get caught...

There are several clues that tell the story. Some more hidden than others.
